definitions.definition: A Christian religious song, especially one in an African-American style, or a similar non-religious song.
Any spiritual function, office, or affair.
definitions.example: He assigns supremacy to the pope in spirituals, and to the emperor in temporals. — Lowell.

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the spirit or the soul.
definitions.example: Respect towards ancestors is an essential part of Thai spiritual practice.

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to God or a place of worship; sacred.
Of or pertaining to spirits; supernatural.
Consisting of spirit; not material; incorporeal.
Of or relating to the intellectual and higher endowments of the mind; mental; intellectual.
Controlled and inspired by the Holy Spirit; pure; holy.
Not lay or temporal; relating to sacred things; ecclesiastical.
definitions.example: the spiritual functions of the clergy; lords spiritual and temporal; a spiritual corporation
